content: this is the ad-free easy to print pdf version of this pattern you can find the free pattern on my blog www theturtletrunk com and the video tutorial on the turtle trunk youtube channel the picot stocking features a beautiful texture from fun crochet stitches make it two-toned candy cane striped multi-color stripe or any color combo you want these are perfect for holding holiday gifts for the family difficulty advanced beginner finished size 17 x 6 5 crochet pattern is written in english only and uses us terminology supplies needed - medium 4 weight yarn i used big twist living total yardage 234 yards / 215 meters - 5 00mm h crochet hook - yarn needle - scissors pattern includes - detailed instructions for a 2 toned stocking with notes upon how to make it striped - special stitch instructions - reference photos - link to free video tutorial
